```py
model.eval()
_, pred = model(data.x, data.edge_index).max(dim=1)
correct = float(pred[data.test_mask].eq(
    data.y[data.test_mask]).sum().item())
accuracy = correct / data.test_mask.sum().item()
print(f'Accuracy: {accuracy:.4f}')
```
